editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-5r: Image of Mary. Répertoire 221. ሰላም ሰላም ለዝክረ ስምኪ በአምኃ ሰርካ ወነገሃ. F-18r: Anaphora of Our Lady Mary attributed to Cyriacus of Bəhənsa, Qǝddase Maryam Gwäs’a, ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡. See HSEA; EMIP 27. F-25v: Image of Mary, Mälk‘a Maryam, መልክአ፡ ማርያም፡, Répertoire 220; MG 735ff.; Incipit: ሰላም ሰላም ለዝክረ ስምኪ ሐዋዝ። F-34r: Image of Jesus Christ, Mälk‘a Iyyäsus, መልክአ፡ ኢየሱስ፡. Répertoire 123. Incipit : ሰላም ለዝክረ ሰምኪ ስመ መሐላ ዘኢየኄሱ. F-36r: Image of the Christian Sabbath, መልክዐ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡. Répertoire 170. Incipit : ሰላም ለዝክረ ሰምኪ ፅዳለ ምሥራቅ ወምዕራብ. F-60r: Image of Mary, ሰላም ለዝክረ ስምኪ ሐመልማል ጽጌ ገነት, arranged in paragraphs. Répertoire 171. F-92v: Praises of Mary, Wəddase Maryam, ውዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡, arranged for the days of the week, written in a different hand with blue and red ink. However, the owner listed in this section is the same as the one noted earlier in the book, namely, ወልደ አማኑኤል. Notes. mentions owner, ወልደ አማኑኤል, and scribe, ወልደ ጊዮርጊስ. F and 7v mention ሊቃነ ጰጰሳት አበ ቄርሎስ (1874-1927), and ብፁዕ ጰጰስ አባ ማቴዎስ (1889-1926). : pasted on the folio is a lithograph of the flight of the Holy Family with a caption in Russian and dated to 1889.
